headline: Smart City Platforms Market Surges to $39.52 billion by 2030 - Dominated by IBM (US), Siemens (Germany), Cisco (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Nov. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Smart City Platforms Market will grow from USD 24.51 billion in 2025 to USD 39.52 billion by 2030 at a compounded annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10.0% during the forecast period. There is growing demand for efficient energy and resource management solutions, with smart platforms playing a critical role in optimizing utilities and promoting sustainability. headline: IBM to implement staff reductions amid AI infrastructure push
summary: The company, which reported a workforce of about 270,000 at the end of 2024, stated that the job cuts are part of regular operational assessments.

headline: Quantum Computing Market Research Report 2025-2030: Market Accelerates with Rising Financial-sector Use Cases, Growing Investment Flows, and a Surge in Partnerships and R&D Alliances
summary: The global quantum computing market is set to grow from USD 3.52 billion in 2025 to USD 20.20 billion by 2030, with a CAGR of 41.8%. The demand for high-performance computing in drug discovery, financial modeling, and logistics optimization drives this growth, countered by challenges like high error rates and qubit instability. Notably, cloud-based deployment will lead the market due to cost efficiencies, with companies such as AWS, Microsoft Azure, and IBM expanding QCaaS offerings. North Ameri
